name: Unbreakable Will
baseDescription: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 3%.

name: Wand Specialization
baseDescription: Increases your damage with Wands by 5%.

name: Silent Resolve
baseDescription: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 8%.

name: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
baseDescription: Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 15%.

name: Improved Power Word: Shield
baseDescription: Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 5%.

name: Martyrdom
baseDescription: Gives you a 50% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike.  The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage and increases resistance to Interrupt effects by 10%.

name: Inner Focus
baseDescription: When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

name: Meditation
baseDescription: Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

name: Improved Inner Fire
baseDescription: Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 20%.

name: Mental Agility
baseDescription: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 4%.

name: Improved Mana Burn
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Mana Burn spell by 0.25 secs.

name: Divine Spirit
baseDescription: Holy power infuses the target, increasing their Spirit by 17 for 30 min.

name: Force of Will
baseDescription: Increases your spell damage by 1% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 1%.

name: Power Infusion
baseDescription: Infuses the target with power, increasing their spell damage and healing by 20%.  Lasts 15 sec.
